name: Axe vs Bow
description:
Synopsis

Axe vs. Bow is a small tower defense game for Android & iOS.  You play as the first line of defense of a great kingdom and have to hold the line against the barbarian invaders who try to conquer your lands.

Armed with a bow and arrow you need to eliminate all attackers that are trying to tear down your walls & bridges.

But beware, not all your arrows work against all enemies. Some have different types of defense. Some even use enchanted gear!!

Fortunately, you also know some fitting enchantments against those :)

Controls & Gameplay

You have to draw in order to select the type of arrow you want to use.

Draw Circles, Triangles, Rectangles to select the shape of an enemy. You can also draw chevrons, arrows, corners, arcs, etc. for the same shapes.  

Draw diagonal lines (direction included) to select an enchantment.

The rune slots below will glow yellow if you selected a combo that enemies are weak against on your current row.

Draw a vertical line to attack and a horizontal line to discard your selection.

You'll find an overview of the patterns in the info menu at the top.

Tap the bridge at different places to switch rows to attack.

Credits

Art and Animation by Meico

Gameplay by Max Kruse

Music by Niklas Wieböker
